documents.document: @KennedyMary Oh no. I forgot that as well
@cmcgovern @MrPaulDuane Never seen the words *shocking* and *reason* in a sentence before. In fairness.
@cmcgovern @MrPaulDuane I killed her because she called me hubby. God damn.
Every day, Sean #Spicer checks his hair, straightens his tie, sobs uncontrollably then breathes in and walks out to the press room
@garethharron And you know what, I was at nothing. Just sitting there watching the news . And then the Sport came on

@emmetbroaders Manure. Great for a glowing skin AND gets rid of the blackheads

@CathalMacCoille Happy to oblige *mumbles incoherently
@MallowNews Imagine what it must be like to be those Biros
@kieranquinnn @danleydon Thank you kind sir
@kieranquinnn I loved it. And as @danleydon will confirm I am a yuge fan of the foopball https://t.co/NDxcGU5x4f

What fresh hell is this
@martylyricfm Now we know where Uncle John got his good looks.
@ramblinghobo @RollsRoyce I'm checking the back of the shed. *fingers crossed*
A few of these @RollsRoyce spares boxes knocking around. Hmmm gosh I'm hearing that Johnny Cash song in my head now https://t.co/1CqQbwWL3m
@CyberAndrew @rollsroycecars Actually it would be @RollsRoyce because Dad worked on Jet Engines . But yes. I get the irony.
@seanieBM I love this story.
I guess I ought to return it to @RollsRoyce but it's living in my pencil case now
From Dad's toolbox https://t.co/d4VAH2Aazm
Sean Spicer pressers. Shocking yet weirdly compelling telly . Like Glenroe used to be
@ellenmcoyne I know it's not fair but I can't help seeing him sitting in his pyjamas. In his Ma's box room
Quickest and most effective way to annoy #Trump is make fun of him. By the glorious @serafinowicz https://t.co/WJsWbCpSMT
@tomdoorley Aren't we just delightful. And so overundereducated
@MrPaulDuane Well I personally can't wait for the moment (in predictable fashion) Prince Philip calls Trump a stairhating overweight slob.
@tomdoorley I, too, dossed my way through one of those top schools. Look at me now, eh. Eh Tom
@MrPaulDuane I don't know what to do. I.... I.... oh lordy
@Marie_Casserly thanks Marie
@juneshannon thanks darlin x
@OwensDamien mmmmmhmmmm look how that turned out
@OwensDamien You should see what happens when you tell him his skin is all loose https://t.co/TAxWI8SqXr
@colmtobin oh. Erm yes well eh same here *blushes with embarassment and regret
@colmtobin I'm thinking a video showing #Trump burning down a Puppy shelter
@colmtobin ah here. I assumed *you* were working on it
@davidcorway Thank you dear
@RuthieFizz no. But she will nag you into submission
Sign! Or I'll send Granny round https://t.co/qbKjjTZI22 #NotInMyName
@CathalMacCoille Happy to help. Cheers! *clink*
@Aiannucci And loads of stairs and slidey slopes
@JillianvT @MargaretEWard @AudreyCarville Well @jonathanhealy that turned out all right in the end didn't it
@DearbhailDibs oh Lord. What. WhathaveIdone
@fionndavenport @jenoconnell He's sitting in his wee room waiting to see what everyone else does first.
Omigod Charlie you're right https://t.co/AVBhnMpA8G
Well now. https://t.co/vm7xrQvSSs
@jonathanhealy Here I'll take the back end you take the front end

@josefoshea @brian_dneen hapfffffff
@TheRichieFlynn @phlaimeaux I should mention I bought them all. And hung them all up in the office right in front of my face. All of them.
@AoifeConnolly oooo! I'd clutch that

Meanwhile. Sarah Palin checks her phone one more time.
Brilliant , fearless @SwearyLady on the #tommytiernanshow
That's not the set from Féach is it #tommytiernanshow
@colmtobin @MrPaulDuane Paul checks his phone at 4.05 am . Nothing. Blank screen. Then the air raid sirens start up outside.
@siliconrepublic @johnnnugent My back garden is available
@shanehegarty I've got 25 years' experience of permanent, incurable Tinnitus in my swop bag if he's interested
@kidd_kong78 Maybe credit @BadLipReading who created it
@Colmogorman For what it's worth I thought it was silly . And sort of pointless @MissusVee @AodhBC
Someone could make a fortune selling Toe uncurling tongs https://t.co/tFROXeCDOb
Thank you God. Thank you @BadLipReading https://t.co/Rwf3yg8Nh8
@faduda Might need to get you one of these https://t.co/Imtbm0iiMg
@angrymiddleaged @TherealGerRyan But mine was tremendous. Braggadociously tremendous
@angrymiddleaged @TherealGerRyan Hapfffffffffffffffffffff
@angrymiddleaged @TherealGerRyan Actually it's 'easily climbed mountain if you think mountain climbing is generally easy'
@TherealGerRyan @angrymiddleaged Well we have 2.5 million Cake shops in Grttan street alone #SligoAlternativeFacts
@dj_mckeown Right. All we need to do now is erm introduce these two people @ireland @joeboating @susankilkenny
@dj_mckeown Yes. Also all the gobstoppers you can fit @joeboating @ireland @susankilkenny
@TherealGerRyan @angrymiddleaged Actually we insist Leitrim pays
@susankilkenny @ireland @joeboating @dj_mckeown I was told there's money in it.
@ireland @susankilkenny @joeboating @dj_mckeown We could just send out a tweet to everyone . Be grand.
@ireland @susankilkenny We must also insist @joeboating and @dj_mckeown have to officiate
@ireland @susankilkenny Um well might be a bit of a problem because Herself has stated she likes the names Tarquin and Moon Unit
@TodayFMNews @todayfm Dream comes true. Hmmm Imagine trying to be equally kind to all the rellies. Even Cousin Tony. Oh my God.
@CathalMacCoille It was you, wasn't it.
@ireland @susankilkenny Sort of quietly hoping they'll run away to get married. Save me a fortune
@ireland @susankilkenny Will do. Also *ahem* college prospects #priorities
@CathalMacCoille She must have been a woman in a million. With a hape o land
@Feargaling @cathalMacCoille I'm so glad I have Feargal to oversee my oversights. Sigh
@ireland @susankilkenny If this works out we might finally get on the #sixone news. For a GOOD reason *cough*
@CathalMacCoille @BBCScotlandNews HApfffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff
@CathalMacCoille @BBCScotlandNews Mind you that was back in the 50s
@CathalMacCoille @BBCScotlandNews Apropos of nothing. Father in law cycled to Dublin and back in one day with nothing but a box of bananas.
@CathalMacCoille @BBCScotlandNews Also an App that occasionally inserts a careless driver you can shout at. Makes the experience more real.
@CathalMacCoille @BBCScotlandNews Maybe that virtual cycle thing could include a can of Eau de Caca. Pour homme. Per Uomo.
@CathalMacCoille @BBCScotlandNews It's good for the soul, the whiff of manure. Very life-affirming.
@CathalMacCoille @BBCScotlandNews It's not the same without the occasional whiff of manure
@susankilkenny That's mad. And yet if you want to do art or design it's all about your work and an interview. Sport should be no different
@TherealGerRyan Eeek! Where are you off to? Do you want to come to #Sligo? We have Cake
@susankilkenny 510 points? Hmmm. What are we planning to study? She needs a hape o points too #Physics
@susankilkenny Sounds good. Her: Funny, gorgeous, brainy, hape o land. Cons: Consumes 1 jar nutella in one go
@susankilkenny Handsome guy. What are his prospects. Does he have a hape o land
Wouldn't it be the most delicious irony if @potus were forced to apologise to Trees and Grass and Animals and Insects @BadlandsNPS #EPA
@GerryMcBride He hasn't fallen over clutching his guts yet. Stay tuned.
@GerryMcBride Husband halfway through the bag. Reads label. *Wild Bird Foo....... arrah* [keeps munching]
